decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - Commencement of development (Full Permission) - The development to which this permission relates shall be commenced not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - Approved Plans - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: Drawing no. CMYK.508.001 (BLOCK AND SITE LOCATION PLANS ) Dated 08/18
Drawing no: D40186-LG-101(PROPOSED GROUND FLOOR)Dated 04/07/2022 
Drawing no : D40186-LB-102(PROPOSED BASEMENT) Dated 04/07/2022
Drawing no. CMYK.508.102(BUILD AND DEMOLITIONS PLAN - GF) Dated 08/18
Drawing no: CMYK.508.104(GENERAL ARRANGEMENT PLAN - GF) Dated 08/18
Drawing no. CMYK.508.108(FINISHES PLAN - GF) Dated 08/18
Drawing no. CMYK.508.201(PROPOSED ELEVATION) Dated 08/18 
Drawing no.CMYK.508.202( SIGNAGE ELEVATIONS) Dated 08/18
Drawing no. CMYK.508.203(INTERIOR ELEVATIONS) Dated 08/18
Drawing no. CMYK.508. 204 (INTERIOR ELEVATIONS)Dated 08/18
Drawing no. CMYK.508.205(INTERIOR ELEVATIONS)Dated 08/18

Condition : 3 - Materials as Specified - The facing materials to be used for the development hereby permitted shall be those specified in the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - Protection of Internal Elements/Features - Suitable precautions must be taken to secure and protect the Listed Building interior and external elements and its curtilage structures against accidental loss or damage during the building work and no such elements may be disturbed or removed temporarily or permanently except as indicated on the approved drawings or with the prior approval in writing of the Local Planning Authority. Particular regard should be given to the following items XXX.

Condition : 5 - Start on Site (Listed Building) - No work shall start on site without prior notification in writing at least 7 working days before the start of the work to the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - The premises shall only for use as a Dental Surgery facility and for no other purpose, (including any other purpose within Class E of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes Order) (1987), or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification.
description: APPLICATION FOR CHANGE OF USE FROM A4 (BAR) TO D1 (DENTAL SURGERY).
